meanings.definition: The leaders or chief members of a group or movement.
meanings.sent1: In the play, the coryphaei guided the other actors in their roles.
meanings.sent2: The coryphaei of the organization made important decisions for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The coryphaei held a meeting to discuss their next big idea.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as a coryphaei among her classmates, always leading by example.
meanings.sent5: The coryphaei were like the captains of a ship, steering the group towards success.

meanings.definition: A group of prominent or influential individuals.
meanings.sent1: The coryphaei of the industry gathered for a conference.
meanings.sent2: The coryphaei in the room commanded attention with their presence.
meanings.sent3: The coryphaei were like a team of superheroes, each with their unique power.
meanings.sent4: Among the students, she was part of the coryphaei, always leading by example.
meanings.sent5: The coryphaei were the stars of the show, shining brightly in their respective fields.
